heading: Boosting visibility of your research impact
subheading: OA.Report finds more articles funded by your organization than anyone else, giving you a greater view of your research impact.

heading: Informed decisions on Open Access
subheading: Gain comprehensive insights across Data Availability Statements (DAS), Open Data, Open Code, preprints, and beyond—empowering you to understand the full scope of openness in your funded research.

heading: Ensuring accountability and compliance
subheading: We set everything up to match your Open Access policy, measuring your articles against your specific compliance requirements—so you can be confident that your standards are met.

heading: Customized, granular analysis
subheading: View tailored breakdowns of your funded articles by grant ID, program, department, and more, structured to your organization’s needs.

heading: Simplifying compliance outreach
subheading: Effortlessly ensure compliance with lists of contactable authors and a one-click email feature right from your dashboard.
